item.description:
Pregenerated Characters will be provided - if players would like to create their own PC, they must be Pathfinder Society legal.
Completion of the scenario provides a Chronicle Sheet, a record of play which provides XP.
NOTE - Please sign up on Warhorn, as I will use it as the priority for reserving a slot!
http://warhorn.net/boston-pfs/

Jason will be running We Be Goblins! and Adam will be running The Cyphermage Dillemma.

Goblin Pregens will be provided. and are required, for We Be Goblins (As you'll be playing as one!)
item.name: Pathfinder Society at Die Hard Games
